distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
xfsprogs was updated to fix one security vulnerability and several bugs.

- Handle unwanted data disclosure in xfs_metadump (bsc#939367, CVE-2012-2150)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: xfs_metadump in xfsprogs before 3.2.4 does not properly obfuscate file data, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading a generated image.
notes.title: CVE description
